actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a special prosecutor to prosecute any offenses against the United States arising out of the "Watergate affair".

summary.text: Provides for the appointment by the President, with the advice and consent of the Senate, of a special prosecutor to prosecute any offenses against the United States arising out of the "Watergate affair". States that the special prosecutor appointed under this Act shall be independent from any department or agency of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a special prosecutor to prosecute any offenses against the United States arising out of the "Watergate affair".
